content:
## Timeblocks

### v1

Didnâ€™t plan out a timeblock for today, so this is more like a recap of how my day went:

```plain text
9:30          | Wake Up
9:30 - 11:00  | Working on Dialect
11:00 - 12:00 | Call with Kevin X about Dialect
12:00 - 13:30 | Working on Dialect and also fixing up blog
13:30 - 14:00 | Fixing up lionconfig
14:00 - 19:30 | Went out with friends
19:30 - 20:00 | Fixing up lionconfig
20:00 - 23:15 | Fixing up blog
```

## Routines

### Morning Routine

```plain text
7:00        | Wake Up
7:00 - 7:15 | Brush Teeth, Make Bed, Place Kindle on Pillow
7:15 - 7:30 | Breakfast
```

### Evening Routine

```plain text
22:00 - 22:25 | Check email; Create timeblock for next day
22:25 - 22:30 | Clear desk; Plug in devices
22:30 - 22:45 | Brush teeth; Quick shower
22:45 - 23:15 | Reading
23:15         | Bedtime; experiment with playing Weightless
```
